Run the Runnable Jar file by clicking the Run.bat file

The commands in the bat File include VM arguments needed to run a Java file with JavaFx features
So for you to run the file on your machine you would need to copy and paste your javaFx sdk lib path in the command below
Make sure you paste your path inside the Qoutation Marks

--module-path "Paste your Path here" --add-modules javafx.controls,javafx.fxml

After copying and pasting into the Run.bat file run the bat file and the mini project applicaton should run
